dip.gui.map

Class XJSVGCanvas.XJSVGUserAgent

  • java.lang.Object
    • dip.gui.map.XJSVGCanvas.XJSVGUserAgent
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    org.apache.batik.bridge.UserAgent, org.apache.batik.util.XMLConstants
    Enclosing class:
    XJSVGCanvas

    protected class XJSVGCanvas.XJSVGUserAgent
extends java.lang.Object
    Specialized UserAgent that checks outer class for validation parameter and subclasses error and message dialogs.
